title: Explore the Wonders of Rome and Venice

activities: 1. Arrive in Rome and check in to your hotel
2. Enjoy a welcome dinner at a local restaurant
1. Visit the Colosseum, the Roman Forum, and the Palatine Hill
2. Explore the Vatican Museums, the Sistine Chapel, and St. Peter's Basilica
1. Take a day trip to Pompeii and see the ancient ruins
2. Return to Rome and have some free time to shop or relax
1. Travel by train to Venice and check in to your hotel
2. Enjoy a gondola ride along the canals and see the Rialto Bridge
1. Visit the Doge's Palace, the Bridge of Sighs, and the Basilica of San Marco
2. Take a boat trip to the islands of Murano, Burano, and Torcello
1. Have a free day to explore Venice at your own pace
2. Join a farewell dinner at a traditional Venetian restaurant
1. Check out from your hotel and depart for your flight home

title: Discover the Beauty of Bali and Lombok

activities: 1. Arrive in Bali and check in to your hotel
2. Relax at the beach or enjoy the hotel facilities
1. Visit the Tanah Lot Temple, the Ubud Monkey Forest, and the Tegalalang Rice Terrace
2. Watch a traditional Balinese dance performance
1. Travel by ferry to Lombok and check in to your hotel
2. Visit the Senggigi Beach and the Pura Batu Bolong Temple
1. Take a boat trip to the Gili Islands and enjoy snorkeling, swimming, and sunbathing
2. See the sunset and the nightlife on Gili Trawangan
1. Return to Lombok and hike to the Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfalls
2. Explore the Senaru Traditional Village and learn about the local culture
1. Check out from your hotel and depart for your flight back to Bali

title: Experience the Magic of Paris and Disneyland

activities: 1. Arrive in Paris and check in to your hotel
2. Enjoy a welcome dinner at a gourmet restaurant
1. Visit the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum, and the Notre Dame Cathedral
2. Cruise along the Seine River and see the city lights
1. Travel by train to Disneyland Paris and have a full day of fun and adventure
2. Meet your favorite Disney characters, watch the parades and shows, and ride the attractions
1. Return to Paris and visit the Arc de Triomphe, the Champs-Élysées, and the Montmartre
2. See the Moulin Rouge and the Sacré-Cœur Basilica
1. Check out from your hotel and depart for your flight home

title: Explore the Culture and Nature of Japan

activities: 1. Arrive in Tokyo and check in to your hotel
2. Enjoy a welcome dinner at a sushi restaurant
1. Visit the Tokyo Skytree, the Imperial Palace, and the Asakusa Temple
2. Experience the Shibuya Crossing, the Harajuku Street, and the Akihabara District
1. Travel by bullet train to Kyoto and check in to your hotel
2. Visit the Kinkaku-ji Temple, the Nijo Castle, and the Gion District
1. Take a day trip to Nara and see the Todai-ji Temple, the Kasuga Shrine, and the Nara Park
2. Feed the friendly deer and enjoy the cherry blossoms
1. Visit the Fushimi Inari Shrine, the Kiyomizu-dera Temple, and the Arashiyama Bamboo Forest
2. Wear a kimono and learn about the Japanese tea ceremony
1. Travel by bullet train to Osaka and check in to your hotel
2. Visit the Osaka Castle, the Dotonbori Street, and the Umeda Sky Building
1. Take a day trip to Hiroshima and see the Peace Memorial Park, the Atomic Bomb Dome, and the Miyajima Island
2. Learn about the history and the hope of the city
1. Check out from your hotel and depart for your flight home

title: Enjoy the Beaches and Islands of Thailand

activities: 1. Arrive in Bangkok and check in to your hotel
2. Relax at the pool or enjoy the hotel facilities
1. Visit the Grand Palace, the Wat Pho, and the Wat Arun
2. Shop at the Chatuchak Weekend Market and the Siam Paragon
1. Travel by plane to Phuket and check in to your hotel
2. Visit the Patong Beach and the Bangla Road
1. Take a boat trip to the Phi Phi Islands and enjoy snorkeling, swimming, and sunbathing
2. See the Maya Bay, the Monkey Beach, and the Viking Cave
1. Travel by bus to Krabi and check in to your hotel
2. Visit the Ao Nang Beach and the Railay Beach
1. Take a boat trip to the Four Islands and enjoy kayaking, fishing, and rock climbing
2. See the Koh Poda, the Koh Gai, the Koh Tub, and the Koh Mor
1. Check out from your hotel and depart for your flight back to Bangkok
